dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4331 IH: To require a 50 percent reduction in the number of limousines in the Federal fleet.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barrow of Georgia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To require a 50 percent reduction in the number of limousines in the Federal fleet.

section.header: Reduction in limousines in Federal fleet

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law and except as provided in subsection (b), for fiscal year 2015 and each fiscal year thereafter, the number of limousines in the Federal fleet shall not exceed 50 percent of the number of limousines in the Federal fleet as of the last day of fiscal year 2014.
Subsection (a) shall not apply with respect to any limousine determined by the President to be essential for reasons of national security.
